com.yantra.ypm.japi.ue

Interface YPMCalculateShippingChargeUE


  • public interface YPMCalculateShippingChargeUE
    User exit for getting the shipping charge of an order.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document calculateShippingCharge(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The YPMCalculateShippingChargeUE user exit is called every time from getOrderPrice API if shipping is not suppressed.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateShippingCharge

        org.w3c.dom.Document calculateShippingCharge(YFSEnvironment env,
                                             org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                      throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException

        The YPMCalculateShippingChargeUE user exit is called every time from getOrderPrice API if shipping is not suppressed. The user exit is expected to return a non-negative shipping charge for the order.

        Before calling this user exit, if Exclusivity has been set for any rule, the selections will be made and finalized for all rules evaluated so far. If any rules of type "Cannot combine with any other Pricing rule - GLOBAL" have been selected then no shipping rules will be applied. If any rules of type "Cannot combine with any other Pricing rule with in the same id - ONE_RULE_WITHIN_ID" have been selected then no shipping rules will be applied for those ids. If any selections were made before calling the user exist, only non-global shipping rules will be considered after the user exit is called. Global shipping rules will only be considered if no rules were applicable before calling the user exit.

        To code custom user exits, implement the method in this interface. The system calls the method in your class. If this method gives any exception, the current transaction is rolled back.


        Related Yantra Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD

        Pre-conditions: This user exit is called unconditionally.

        Post-conditions: The return document should contain the shipping charge to be used for shipping calculations.


        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. Contains all the prices and adjustments of the order prior to shipping. For more information, see the associated input xml files.


        Returns:
        An XML that contains the shipping charge for the order. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.


        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered. The transaction is aborted and changes are rolled back.
